title: Bought
description: I DESTROYED HER WORLD WHEN I BOUGHT HERI made a business on selling women, not falling for them.But when I saw her on the auction block.So fragile, so pure, so inexperienced.Something in me snapped.I destroyed her world when I bought her, but now I’m her road to salvation.The only problem is: Some other bastard thinks that Cassie belongs to him.But he’ll back off if he knows what’s good.Because Cassie is mine.I’ll own her.I’ll ruin her.I’ll make her discover how wild she can be.And I’ll kill anyone who dares to take her away from me.
author: Brook Wilder
